product_name: Aqua Sphere Kayenne Smoke Lens Swim Goggles
long_description: The latex-free Aqua Sphere Kayenne Smoke Lens Swim Goggles provide comfortable, fog-free vision for your training sessions in the pool or lake. Scratch-resistant Plexisol(R) synthetic resin lenses help keep your vision clear with their antifog properties; they offer 100% UVA and UVB protection. Lenses provide 180deg of visibility; smoke lenses offer high visibility outdoors or in bright light. Quick-Fit Buckle(TM) allows easy adjustments while you're wearing the goggles. Stabilizing nose bridge helps keep the fit secure and comfortable. Silicone strap endures regular use. The Aqua Sphere Kayenne Smoke Lens Swim Goggles include a hard plastic case.
short_description: The latex-free Aqua Sphere Kayenne Smoke Lens Swim Goggles provide comfortable, fog-free vision for your training sessions in the pool or lake.
